snippet: Disappointing growth in the services sector drove trading, and several retailers missed sales estimates, dragging the market down.
abstract: Stocks fall as economic data sends mixed signals on the recovery.
lead_paragraph: Disappointing growth in the services sector drove trading, and several retailers missed sales estimates, dragging the market down.

headline.seo: Mixed Signs on Recovery Send Shares Down
headline.main: Mixed Signs on Recovery Send Shares Down
headline.print_headline: Mixed Signs on Recovery Send Shares Down
